name: Mastermind (Reset64 Magazine)
overview: Mastermind or Master Mind is a code-breaking game for two players. The modern game with pegs was invented in 1970 by Mordecai Meirowitz, an Israeli postmaster and telecommunications expert. It resembles an earlier pencil and paper game called Bulls and Cows that may date back a century or more. This version was published on the Reset #09.5 Mix-i-Disk and in Reset 64 magazine 9.5.
